subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: Black Monday — the day after the N.F.L. regular season when failed head coaches are sent packing — came three weeks early as Kansas City dismissed Todd Haley, hours before Miami fired Tony Sparano.
snippet: Black Monday — the day after the N.F.L. regular season when failed head coaches are sent packing — came three weeks early as Kansas City dismissed Todd Haley, hours before Miami fired Tony Sparano.
